Name: BLOCKED ZONA
About the game: BLOCKED ZONE is a 2D shooter in which you play as a special unit mercenary who has gone to an infested area infested with zombies in search of the R-327 military chip. The fate of the world is at stake. Arm yourself with the best military weapons and go into battle! On the way you will meet many different monsters that will try to destroy you, the main thing is patience. In the game you will find many tasks, 4 chapters with a story and a variety of gameplay, and much more! Good luck mercenary!
